markdownRemark.html:
Accessibility and 508

This directory contains anything related to accessibility of Vets.gov including

  • vets.gov accessibility and 508 launch guidelines and best practices: all product launches must follow these guidelines

  • Currently open 508/accessibility tickets: nothing should live here for longer than one program increment

  • Section 508 office evaluation tracking doc: list of reviewed/signed-off products; products in review and pending sign-off; products in queue to be sent to 508 office for testing

  • 508 audit reports

  • meeting notes from Vets.gov/508 office meetings

  • anything else that comes up! Blog posts? User research studies with users with disabilities? The sky's the limit!

Manual testing

To reproduce a reported error on Mac OS X, you can try out Voice Over (and gain an understanding of how users with screenreaders navigate) by following these instructions. Please also read the vets.gov launch guidelines doc before launching any product.

  • Mac VoiceOver Guide
  • Quick Guide to Using VoiceOver on Mac OS X: written by Victor Tsaran, who works on making Google products accessible

Automated testing

  • Most of our end-to-end tests include calls to this axeCheck script which uses the aXe API, so we can catch and fix issues and regressions before deploying to production.
  • To debug an issue, you may find the aXe dev tools Chrome extension or Firefox plugin useful
